page.title: 20 Social Life in Keith
page.content:
Public Houses where alcohol is sold play a large part in the social life of the community.There are 15 premises in Keith licensed to sell alcohol, including hotels,pubs and Clubs.The age limit for drinking alcohol is 18 years old but there is a problem with under- age drinking.The opening hours of licensed premises are strictly controlled by law.Regular hours are from 11a.m. to 2.30p.m.and 5p.m.to 11p.m. although these hours have been extended recently.Many pubs provide entertainment and games including darts, pool and dominoes.
The material for this Project was compiled and written by 2nd and 3rd year pupils at Keith Grammar School under the guidance of their Geography teacher,Mr.T.J.Smith during May and June,1985.
